## Source: amazon-inspector (94bc97753b6e7a9fa1430482f3266bf40e985ab97ef48bbd35a8d7fd8f404ca6)
The package ing-feat-pis-single-payments was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c51ed8966a565b05486a91d8f26fab8d465caf4ed1649e851f13f378aa02867d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ing-feat-pis-single-payments' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
